mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fishing Notes
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Evans, George Bird
mdRecord.dcterms:description: In this journal, George writes of fishing for trout in Little Laurel, Lick Run, and Roaring Creek. He details both spinner and wet fly fishing. Beginning in October, he begins detailing his outings shooting with his dogs Blue, Grouse, and Dawn. He laments that timbering has ruined grouse cover. He visits Brandonville, and mentions that his father is ill. Shooting Notes begin on page 9.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Anecdotes
